ABOUT.TITLE: About Bhakti Dhaam
ABOUT.STORY_TEXT: Bhakti Dhaam was born from a desire to bridge the gap between ancient spirituality and modern convenience. We recognized the need for a comprehensive, accessible guide for pilgrims visiting India's most sacred cities.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: To empower spiritual journeys through technology, making sacred knowledge and practical information accessible to devotees worldwide.
ABOUT.VISION_TEXT: To create a global platform that preserves and promotes India's spiritual heritage while facilitating seamless pilgrimage experiences.
